title: april 20: remembering columbine [hosted by: Tessa Violet]
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Tessa Violet talks about the impact of the Columbine school shooting. After, she talks about Anne-Marie’s 2002. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
